title: How to Make Pineapple Fried Rice

steps.headline: Dice your chicken breast and finely chop the garlic and ginger.
steps.description: Stir fry in a little oil (not the sesame oil) and add the lemon grass stalk. Season with a dash of soy sauce.

steps.headline: Add and break up the rice in the mixture.
steps.description: Add a dash of chilli sauce.

steps.headline: Make a "well" in the middle of the rice so you can see the bottom of the wok.
steps.description: Bring the heat right down and crack an egg into the well. Whisk roughly with a pair of chopsticks. Allow the egg to set halfway, then fold the rice into the egg and give everything a good mix.

steps.headline: Add the pineapple roughly chopped.
steps.description: Sprinkle over the crushed cashew nuts and chopped spring onions. Season with salt and pepper and a little sesame oil. Mix thoroughly.

steps.headline: Turn off the heat, remove the lemon grass stalk, add chopped coriander, mix and serve.

text: Dice your chicken breast and finely chop the garlic and ginger. Stir fry in a little oil (not the sesame oil) and add the lemon grass stalk. Season with a dash of soy sauce. Add and break up the rice in the mixture. Add a dash of chilli sauce. Make a "well" in the middle of the rice so you can see the bottom of the wok. Bring the heat right down and crack an egg into the well. Whisk roughly with a pair of chopsticks. Allow the egg to set halfway, then fold the rice into the egg and give everything a good mix. Add the pineapple roughly chopped. Sprinkle over the crushed cashew nuts and chopped spring onions. Season with salt and pepper and a little sesame oil. Mix thoroughly. Turn off the heat, remove the lemon grass stalk, add chopped coriander, mix and serve.  Finished.
